About Us
2025-01-03T22:27:32-05:00
About Sun & Stars
International Film Festival
Welcome to the Donald M. Ephraim Sun & Stars International Film Festival (SASIFF)! This exciting cultural event in Palm Beach County, Florida showcases a diverse collection of award-winning international films to celebrate and amplify unique voices through cinema. Presented by MorseLife Health System, founded by visionary Donald M. Ephraim, and co-founded by Terri C. Sriberg, the festival has enjoyed several sold-out screenings, solidifying its status as an important event to South Florida.
Our international film lineup is carefully curated by Artistic Director, Barbara Scharres. It features a diverse selection of films from various countries and spans genres such as documentaries, historical epics, LGBTQIA+ movies, romances, comedies, and more. SASIFF offers Palm Beach County residents and visitors the opportunity to explore many cultures and celebrate global cinema together.
SASIFF will return in 2025 for its third year! Want to be the first to know about special announcements and ticket sales? Sign up to receive festival updates
here
.
FESTIVAL FOUNDER
Donald M. Ephraim
FESTIVAL CO-FOUNDER
Terri C. Sriberg
About Sun & Stars International Film Festival
FESTIVAL FOUNDER
Donald M. Ephraim
FESTIVAL CO-FOUNDER
Terri C. Sriberg
Welcome to the Donald M. Ephraim Sun & Stars International Film Festival (SASIFF)! This exciting cultural event in Palm Beach County, Florida showcases a diverse collection of award-winning international films to celebrate and amplify unique voices through cinema. Presented by MorseLife Health System, founded by visionary Donald M. Ephraim, and co-founded by Terri C. Sriberg, the festival has enjoyed several sold-out screenings, solidifying its status as an important event to South Florida.
Our international film lineup is carefully curated by Artistic Director, Barbara Scharres. It features a diverse selection of films from various countries and spans genres such as documentaries, historical epics, LGBTQIA+ movies, romances, comedies, and more. SASIFF offers Palm Beach County residents and visitors the opportunity to explore many cultures and celebrate global cinema together.
SASIFF will return in 2025 for its third year! Want to be the first to know about special announcements and ticket sales? Sign up to receive festival updates
here
.
MEET OUR CAST OF
FILM FESTIVAL EXPERTS
Barbara Scharres
,
Artistic Director
Barbara Scharres is a film scholar, writer, and lecturer who has published feature articles in criticism in film magazines and journals, including Film Comment, American Cinematographer, Chicago Reader, Variety, The Independent, Chicago Sun-Times, and www.RogerEbert.com, an outlet for which she has contributed extensive coverage of the Cannes Film Festival for more than twenty years. After receiving an undergraduate degree in art from St. Xavier University, she was awarded a master of fine arts from the School of the Art Institute of Chicago. In 2006, the French government awarded Scharres one of its highest honors by designating her a Chevalier de L’Ordre des Arts et des Lettres.
Nathalie Glaze
,
Film Festival Manager
Nathalie Glaze
,
Film Festival Manager
A native of Palm Beach County, Glaze brings experience with two of the nation’s most significant film festivals, having assisted with coordinating and managing VIP events for the Tribeca Film Institute and having served as a festival coordinator for advancement events for the Sundance Film Institute. She received a bachelor’s degree in business media and arts management from Marymount Manhattan College in New York.
Whether you prefer light-hearted comedy or thought-provoking drama, you’ll love the
Donald M. Ephraim Sun & Stars International Film Festival, presented by MorseLife!
Whether you prefer light-hearted comedy or thought-provoking drama, you’ll love the Donald M. Ephraim Sun & Stars International Film Festival, presented by MorseLife!
